alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Northern Fulton; Northern Herkimer; Southern Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 6:19PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Hamilton, northwestern Fulton and central Herkimer Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 619 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles southwest of Lake Pleasant to near Poland. Movement was northwest at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Old Forge, Ohio, Newport, Middleville, Poland, Inlet, Cold Brook, Brown Tract Pond Campground, Eighth Lake Campground, McKeever, Limekiln Lake Campground, Nicks Lake Campground, Eagle Bay, Northwood, Raquette Lake, Alger Island Public Campground, Russia, Norway, West Frankfort and Nobleboro. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for eastern New York.

area.areaDesc: Hamilton; Northern Fulton; Northern Herkimer; Southern Herkimer
